document:
<sentence id="s1" text="Vitamin-B6-dependent epilepsies are a heterogenous group of treatable disorders due to mutations in several genes (li>ALDH7A1, PNPO, ALPL or li>ALDH4A1).">
<sentence id="s2" text="In neonatal seizures, defects in li>ALDH7A1 and PNPO explain a major fraction of cases.">
